name: Rethoric
all_locations: San Diego, CA, USA; Mexico City, CDMX, Mexico; Remote
long_description:
Most B2B founders know the value of building an audience on LinkedIn, but the process demands consistency, time, creativity, writing skills, and energy—things founders often lack.

Rethoric is a plug-and-play content team specializing in founder-led LinkedIn strategies for startup founders. 

Our approach positions founders as industry authorities in their niche, creating impactful content and engagement strategies that attract and engage their target customers.

By managing your LinkedIn presence with your authentic voice, we enable you to build an audience, establish credibility, and create a scalable inbound marketing channel that drives consistent, qualified leads—on autopilot.
one_liner: Founder-led LinkedIn Content Agency for B2B Founders
